title: #287 Worked This Tool So Hard
itunes:title: #287 Worked This Tool So Hard
description:
Nikki is looking forward to being in airplane mode and snoozing to the east coast. She and Andrew talk about how to handle fights with your partner and how Love Is Blind showed something that Nikki learned for her relationship. Nikki teases some topics she discussed on The Tiger Belly Podcast. You Heard It Here First; a laboring orgasm and a festival none of us are going to. For Wild Card Wednesday they play Esther Perel's Where Should We Begin? and talk hard lessons learned about love. In The Final Thought Andrew talks about the feeling of being in trouble and Nikki gives her two cents on the Anti-Hero video controversy. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
